abstract: A short film produced by the Department of Information for the Department of External Territories in 1946 depicting the Australian government's assistance to New Guinea.
description: A study of Australia's responsibilities and administration issues in Papua New Guinea immediately after World War 2, with particular emphasis on the life and the needs of Papuans. Commentary by Peter Finch, researched by Catherine Duncan, script by Catherine Duncan, photography by Frank Bagnall, music by John Kay.
